# Tab Item

## Usage:

```html
<p-tab-item>
    <!-- content -->
</p-tab-item>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                   | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Wether the tab item is active | `boolean` | `false` |
